name: @di-rs/rollercoaster
description: CLI tool for running tasks without knowing the manager
author: Dima Portish

scripts.build:bin:macos-arm64: bun build --compile --minify --define process.env.NODE_ENV='"production"' --external react-devtools-core --target=bun-darwin-arm64 src/index.ts --outfile dist/rollercoaster-macos-arm64
scripts.build:bin:macos-x64: bun build --compile --minify --define process.env.NODE_ENV='"production"' --external react-devtools-core --target=bun-darwin-x64 src/index.ts --outfile dist/rollercoaster-macos-x64
scripts.build:bin:linux-x64: bun build --compile --minify --define process.env.NODE_ENV='"production"' --external react-devtools-core --target=bun-linux-x64 src/index.ts --outfile dist/rollercoaster-linux-x64
scripts.build:bin:windows-x64: bun build --compile --minify --define process.env.NODE_ENV='"production"' --external react-devtools-core --target=bun-windows-x64 src/index.ts --outfile dist/rollercoaster-windows-x64
scripts.build: bun run build:bin:macos-arm64 && bun run build:bin:macos-x64 && bun run build:bin:linux-x64 && bun run build:bin:windows-x64
